fields.name: Description
fields.value: A powerful mage who can deal massive damage to enemy units with spirit bombs while also reducing their defense and stunning them.

fields.name: Arena Troops
fields.value: Witchcraft Totem, Stone Golem, Frost Archers, Voodoo Dolls, Peltasts, Pirate Ship, Undead Soldier, Magic Apprentice, Ghost Assassins
